title: Topological Manifolds
content: Found this and was curious about how manifolds would be expressed in set.mm: https://mathoverflow.net/questions/336367/real-manifolds-in-a-theorem-prover This chapter proposes to define first Manifold topologies, which characterise topological manifold, and then to extends the structure with presentations, i.e. equivalence classes of atlases for a given topological space. We suggest to use the extensible structures to define the "topological space" aspect of topological manifolds, and then extend it with charts/presentations.

blocks.name: df-mntop
blocks.content: Define the class of N-manifold topologies, as 2nd countable, Hausdorff topologies, locally homeomorphic to a ball of the Euclidean space of dimension N. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 22-Dec-2019.)

blocks.name: relmntop
blocks.content: Manifold is a relation. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 28-Dec-2019.)

blocks.name: ismntoplly
blocks.content: Property of being a manifold. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 28-Dec-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm ismntoplly(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(c1, c2)), wb(wbr(c0, cmntop, c1), w3a(wcel(c1, c2ndc), wcel(c1, cha), wcel(c1, clly(cec(cfv(ctopn, cfv(cehl, c0)), chmph))))))
} = {
  bitr4d(wa(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(c1, c2)), wbr(c0, cmntop, c1), w3a(wcel(c1, c2ndc), wcel(c1, cha), wcel(c1, clly(cec(cfv(ctopn, cfv(cehl, c0)), chmph)))), wa(wcel(c0, cn0), w3a(wcel(c1, c2ndc), wcel(c1, cha), wcel(c1, clly(cec(cfv(ctopn, cfv(cehl, c0)), chmph))))))
  brabga(hs0, hs1, c0, cn0, c1, c2, cmntop, wa(wcel(c0, cn0), w3a(wcel(c1, c2ndc), wcel(c1, cha), wcel(c1, clly(cec(cfv(ctopn, cfv(cehl, c0)), chmph))))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cn0), w3a(wcel(cv(hs1), c2ndc), wcel(cv(hs1), cha), wcel(cv(hs1), clly(cec(cfv(ctopn, cfv(cehl, cv(hs0))), chmph))))))
  anbi12d(wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cn0), w3a(wcel(cv(hs1), c2ndc), wcel(cv(hs1), cha), wcel(cv(hs1), clly(cec(cfv(ctopn, cfv(cehl, cv(hs0))), chmph)))), wcel(c0, cn0), w3a(wcel(c1, c2ndc), wcel(c1, cha), wcel(c1, clly(cec(cfv(ctopn, cfv(cehl, c0)), chmph)))))
  eleq1d(cv(hs0), cn0, c0, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c1)))
  simpl(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c1))
  3anbi123d(wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c1)), wcel(cv(hs1), c2ndc), wcel(cv(hs1), cha), wcel(cv(hs1), clly(cec(cfv(ctopn, cfv(cehl, cv(hs0))), chmph))), wcel(c1, c2ndc), wcel(c1, cha), wcel(c1, clly(cec(cfv(ctopn, cfv(cehl, c0)), chmph))))
  eleq1d(cv(hs1), c2ndc, c1, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c1)))
  eleq1d(cv(hs1), cha, c1, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c1)))
  eleq12d(cv(hs1), clly(cec(cfv(ctopn, cfv(cehl, cv(hs0))), chmph)), c1, clly(cec(cfv(ctopn, cfv(cehl, c0)), chmph)), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c1)))
  simpr(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c1))
  adantr(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c1), wceq(clly(cec(cfv(ctopn, cfv(cehl, cv(hs0))), chmph)), clly(cec(cfv(ctopn, cfv(cehl, c0)), chmph))))
  syl(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(clly(cec(cfv(ctopn, cfv(cehl, cv(hs0))), chmph)), clly(cec(cfv(ctopn, cfv(cehl, c0)), chmph))), wceq(cec(cfv(ctopn, cfv(cehl, cv(hs0))), chmph), cec(cfv(ctopn, cfv(cehl, c0)), chmph)))
  eceq1d(cfv(ctopn, cfv(cehl, cv(hs0))), chmph, cfv(ctopn, cfv(cehl, c0)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  2fveq3(cv(hs0), c0, ctopn, cehl)
  llyeq(cec(cfv(ctopn, cfv(cehl, cv(hs0))), chmph), cec(cfv(ctopn, cfv(cehl, c0)), chmph))
  df-mntop(hs0, hs1)
  biantrurd(wa(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(c1, c2)), w3a(wcel(c1, c2ndc), wcel(c1, cha), wcel(c1, clly(cec(cfv(ctopn, cfv(cehl, c0)), chmph)))), wcel(c0, cn0))
  simpl(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(c1, c2))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wcel(c0, cn0), w3a(wcel(c1, c2ndc), wcel(c1, cha), wcel(c1, clly(cec(cfv(ctopn, cfv(cehl, c0)), chmph))))))
  diff.hs1.w(wa(wcel(c0, cn0), w3a(wcel(c1, c2ndc), wcel(c1, cha), wcel(c1, clly(cec(cfv(ctopn, cfv(cehl, c0)), chmph))))))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm ismntoplly(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ ℕ0 ∧ c1 ∈ c2)→(c0[ManTop]c1 ↔(c1 ∈ 2ndc ∧ c1 ∈ Haus ∧ c1 ∈ Locally([(TopOpen `(EEhil ` c0))]~=))))
} = {
  bitr4d((c0 ∈ ℕ0 ∧ c1 ∈ c2), c0[ManTop]c1, (c1 ∈ 2ndc ∧ c1 ∈ Haus ∧ c1 ∈ Locally([(TopOpen `(EEhil ` c0))]~ =)), (c0 ∈ ℕ0 ∧(c1 ∈ 2ndc ∧ c1 ∈ Haus ∧ c1 ∈ Locally([(TopOpen `(EEhil ` c0))]~ =))))
  brabga(hs0, hs1, c0, cn0, c1, c2, cmntop, (c0 ∈ ℕ0 ∧(c1 ∈ 2ndc ∧ c1 ∈ Haus ∧ c1 ∈ Locally([(TopOpen `(EEhil ` c0))]~ =))), (hs0 ∈ ℕ0 ∧(hs1 ∈ 2ndc ∧ hs1 ∈ Haus ∧ hs1 ∈ Locally([(TopOpen `(EEhil ` hs0))]~ =))))
  anbi12d((hs0 = c0 ∧ hs1 = c1), hs0 ∈ ℕ0, (hs1 ∈ 2ndc ∧ hs1 ∈ Haus ∧ hs1 ∈ Locally([(TopOpen `(EEhil ` hs0))]~ =)), c0 ∈ ℕ0, (c1 ∈ 2ndc ∧ c1 ∈ Haus ∧ c1 ∈ Locally([(TopOpen `(EEhil ` c0))]~ =)))
  eleq1d(hs0, cn0, c0, (hs0 = c0 ∧ hs1 = c1))
  simpl(hs0 = c0, hs1 = c1)
  3anbi123d((hs0 = c0 ∧ hs1 = c1), hs1 ∈ 2ndc, hs1 ∈ Haus, hs1 ∈ Locally([(TopOpen `(EEhil ` hs0))]~ =), c1 ∈ 2ndc, c1 ∈ Haus, c1 ∈ Locally([(TopOpen `(EEhil ` c0))]~ =))
  eleq1d(hs1, c2ndc, c1, (hs0 = c0 ∧ hs1 = c1))
  eleq1d(hs1, cha, c1, (hs0 = c0 ∧ hs1 = c1))
  eleq12d(hs1, Locally([(TopOpen `(EEhil ` hs0))]~ =), c1, Locally([(TopOpen `(EEhil ` c0))]~ =), (hs0 = c0 ∧ hs1 = c1))
  simpr(hs0 = c0, hs1 = c1)
  adantr(hs0 = c0, hs1 = c1, Locally([(TopOpen `(EEhil ` hs0))]~ =)= Locally([(TopOpen `(EEhil ` c0))]~ =))
  syl(hs0 = c0, Locally([(TopOpen `(EEhil ` hs0))]~ =)= Locally([(TopOpen `(EEhil ` c0))]~ =), [(TopOpen `(EEhil ` hs0))]~ = =[(TopOpen `(EEhil ` c0))]~ =)
  eceq1d((TopOpen `(EEhil ` hs0)), chmph, (TopOpen `(EEhil ` c0)), hs0 = c0)
  2fveq3(hs0, c0, ctopn, cehl)
  llyeq([(TopOpen `(EEhil ` hs0))]~ =, [(TopOpen `(EEhil ` c0))]~ =)
  df-mntop(hs0, hs1)
  biantrurd((c0 ∈ ℕ0 ∧ c1 ∈ c2), (c1 ∈ 2ndc ∧ c1 ∈ Haus ∧ c1 ∈ Locally([(TopOpen `(EEhil ` c0))]~ =)), c0 ∈ ℕ0)
  simpl(c0 ∈ ℕ0, c1 ∈ c2)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w((c0 ∈ ℕ0 ∧(c1 ∈ 2ndc ∧ c1 ∈ Haus ∧ c1 ∈ Locally([(TopOpen `(EEhil ` c0))]~ =))))
  diff.hs1.w((c0 ∈ ℕ0 ∧(c1 ∈ 2ndc ∧ c1 ∈ Haus ∧ c1 ∈ Locally([(TopOpen `(EEhil ` c0))]~ =))))
}

blocks.content: Property of being a manifold. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 5-Jan-2020.)

thm ismntop(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(c1, c2)), wb(wbr(c0, cmntop, c1), w3a(wcel(c1, c2ndc), wcel(c1, cha), wral(s0, c1, wral(s1, cv(s0), wrex(s2, cin(c1, cpw(cv(s0))), wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2)), wbr(co(c1, crest, cv(s2)), chmph, cfv(ctopn, cfv(cehl, c0))))))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
} = {
  bitrd(wa(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(c1, c2)), wbr(c0, cmntop, c1), w3a(wcel(c1, c2ndc), wcel(c1, cha), wral(s0, c1, wral(s1, cv(s0), wrex(s2, cin(c1, cpw(cv(s0))), wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2)), wbr(co(c1, crest, cv(s2)), chmph, cfv(ctopn, cfv(cehl, c0)))))))), w3a(wcel(c1, c2ndc), wcel(c1, cha), wcel(c1, clly(cec(cfv(ctopn, cfv(cehl, c0)), chmph)))))
  ismntoplly(c0, c1, c2)
  adantr(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(c1, c2), wb(w3a(wcel(c1, c2ndc), wcel(c1, cha), wcel(c1, clly(cec(cfv(ctopn, cfv(cehl, c0)), chmph)))), w3a(wcel(c1, c2ndc), wcel(c1, cha), wral(s0, c1, wral(s1, cv(s0), wrex(s2, cin(c1, cpw(cv(s0))), wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2)), wbr(co(c1, crest, cv(s2)), chmph, cfv(ctopn, cfv(cehl, c0))))))))))
  3bitr4g(wcel(c0, cn0), w3a(wcel(c1, c2ndc), wcel(c1, cha), wcel(c1, clly(cec(cfv(ctopn, cfv(cehl, c0)), chmph)))), w3a(wcel(c1, c2ndc), wcel(c1, cha), wral(s0, c1, wral(s1, cv(s0), wrex(s2, cin(c1, cpw(cv(s0))), wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2)), wbr(co(c1, crest, cv(s2)), chmph, cfv(ctopn, cfv(cehl, c0)))))))), wa(wcel(c1, c2ndc), wa(wcel(c1, cha), wcel(c1, clly(cec(cfv(ctopn, cfv(cehl, c0)), chmph))))), wa(wcel(c1, c2ndc), wa(wcel(c1, cha), wral(s0, c1, wral(s1, cv(s0), wrex(s2, cin(c1, cpw(cv(s0))), wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2)), wbr(co(c1, crest, cv(s2)), chmph, cfv(ctopn, cfv(cehl, c0))))))))))
  anbi2d(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(c1, c2ndc), wa(wcel(c1, cha), wcel(c1, clly(cec(cfv(ctopn, cfv(cehl, c0)), chmph)))), wa(wcel(c1, cha), wral(s0, c1, wral(s1, cv(s0), wrex(s2, cin(c1, cpw(cv(s0))), wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2)), wbr(co(c1, crest, cv(s2)), chmph, cfv(ctopn, cfv(cehl, c0)))))))))
  pm5.32da(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(c1, cha), wcel(c1, clly(cec(cfv(ctopn, cfv(cehl, c0)), chmph))), wral(s0, c1, wral(s1, cv(s0), wrex(s2, cin(c1, cpw(cv(s0))), wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2)), wbr(co(c1, crest, cv(s2)), chmph, cfv(ctopn, cfv(cehl, c0))))))))
  3bitr4rd(wa(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(c1, cha)), wcel(c1, clly(cec(cfv(ctopn, cfv(cehl, c0)), chmph))), wral(s0, c1, wral(s1, cv(s0), wrex(s2, cin(c1, cpw(cv(s0))), wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2)), wbr(co(c1, crest, cv(s2)), chmph, cfv(ctopn, cfv(cehl, c0))))))), wral(s0, c1, wral(s1, cv(s0), wrex(s2, cin(c1, cpw(cv(s0))), wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2)), wcel(co(c1, crest, cv(s2)), cec(cfv(ctopn, cfv(cehl, c0)), chmph)))))), wa(wcel(c1, ctop), wral(s0, c1, wral(s1, cv(s0), wrex(s2, cin(c1, cpw(cv(s0))), wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2)), wcel(co(c1, crest, cv(s2)), cec(cfv(ctopn, cfv(cehl, c0)), chmph))))))))
  biantrurd(wa(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(c1, cha)), wral(s0, c1, wral(s1, cv(s0), wrex(s2, cin(c1, cpw(cv(s0))), wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2)), wcel(co(c1, crest, cv(s2)), cec(cfv(ctopn, cfv(cehl, c0)), chmph)))))), wcel(c1, ctop))
  adantl(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(c1, cha), wcel(c1, ctop))
  haustop(c1)
  2ralbidv(s0, s1, c1, cv(s0), wa(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(c1, cha)), wrex(s2, cin(c1, cpw(cv(s0))), wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2)), wbr(co(c1, crest, cv(s2)), chmph, cfv(ctopn, cfv(cehl, c0))))), wrex(s2, cin(c1, cpw(cv(s0))), wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2)), wcel(co(c1, crest, cv(s2)), cec(cfv(ctopn, cfv(cehl, c0)), chmph)))))
  rexbidv(s2, cin(c1, cpw(cv(s0))), wa(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(c1, cha)), wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2)), wbr(co(c1, crest, cv(s2)), chmph, cfv(ctopn, cfv(cehl, c0)))), wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2)), wcel(co(c1, crest, cv(s2)), cec(cfv(ctopn, cfv(cehl, c0)), chmph))))
  anbi2d(wa(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(c1, cha)), wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2)), wbr(co(c1, crest, cv(s2)), chmph, cfv(ctopn, cfv(cehl, c0))), wcel(co(c1, crest, cv(s2)), cec(cfv(ctopn, cfv(cehl, c0)), chmph)))
  a1i(wa(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(c1, cha)), wb(wbr(co(c1, crest, cv(s2)), chmph, cfv(ctopn, cfv(cehl, c0))), wcel(co(c1, crest, cv(s2)), cec(cfv(ctopn, cfv(cehl, c0)), chmph))))
  bitr2i(wbr(co(c1, crest, cv(s2)), chmph, cfv(ctopn, cfv(cehl, c0))), wcel(co(c1, crest, cv(s2)), cec(cfv(ctopn, cfv(cehl, c0)), chmph)), wbr(cfv(ctopn, cfv(cehl, c0)), chmph, co(c1, crest, cv(s2))))
  mp2b(wb(wcel(co(c1, crest, cv(s2)), cec(cfv(ctopn, cfv(cehl, c0)), chmph)), wbr(cfv(ctopn, cfv(cehl, c0)), chmph, co(c1, crest, cv(s2)))), wer(chmph, ctop), wrel(chmph))
  hmpher()
  errel(chmph, ctop)
  relelec(chmph, co(c1, crest, cv(s2)), cfv(ctopn, cfv(cehl, c0)))
  hmphsymb(cfv(ctopn, cfv(cehl, c0)), co(c1, crest, cv(s2)))
  a1i(wa(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(c1, cha)), wb(wcel(c1, clly(cec(cfv(ctopn, cfv(cehl, c0)), chmph))), wa(wcel(c1, ctop), wral(s0, c1, wral(s1, cv(s0), wrex(s2, cin(c1, cpw(cv(s0))), wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2)), wcel(co(c1, crest, cv(s2)), cec(cfv(ctopn, cfv(cehl, c0)), chmph)))))))))
  islly(s0, s1, s2, c1, cec(cfv(ctopn, cfv(cehl, c0)), chmph))
  3anass(wcel(c1, c2ndc), wcel(c1, cha), wcel(c1, clly(cec(cfv(ctopn, cfv(cehl, c0)), chmph))))
  3anass(wcel(c1, c2ndc), wcel(c1, cha), wral(s0, c1, wral(s1, cv(s0), wrex(s2, cin(c1, cpw(cv(s0))), wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2)), wbr(co(c1, crest, cv(s2)), chmph, cfv(ctopn, cfv(cehl, c0))))))))
  diff.wa.s(s0, wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(c1, cha))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, cn0)
  diff.cn0.s(s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c1, cha)
  diff.cha.s(s0)
  diff.wa.s(s1, wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(c1, cha))
  diff.wcel.s(s1, c0, cn0)
  diff.cn0.s(s1)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, c1, cha)
  diff.cha.s(s1)
  diff.wa.s(s2, wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(c1, cha))
  diff.wcel.s(s2, c0, cn0)
  diff.cn0.s(s2)
  diff.wcel.s(s2, c1, cha)
  diff.cha.s(s2)

  diff.cfv.s(s0, ctopn, cfv(cehl, c0))
  diff.ctopn.s(s0)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cehl, c0)
  diff.cehl.s(s0)
  diff.chmph.s(s0)
  diff.cec.s(s1, cfv(ctopn, cfv(cehl, c0)), chmph)

  diff.cehl.s(s1)
  diff.chmph.s(s1)
  diff.cec.s(s2, cfv(ctopn, cfv(cehl, c0)), chmph)

blocks.pretty:
thm ismntop(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ ℕ0 ∧ c1 ∈ c2)→(c0[ManTop]c1 ↔(c1 ∈ 2ndc ∧ c1 ∈ Haus ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c1, ∀(s1 ∈ s0, ∃(s2 ∈(c1 ⋂ P(s0)),(s1 ∈ s2 ∧(c1[|`t]s2)[~=](TopOpen `(EEhil ` c0)))))))))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s2, c0)
  ⊣ d(s2, c1)
} = {
  bitrd((c0 ∈ ℕ0 ∧ c1 ∈ c2), c0[ManTop]c1, (c1 ∈ 2ndc ∧ c1 ∈ Haus ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c1, ∀(s1 ∈ s0, ∃(s2 ∈(c1 ⋂ P(s0)),(s1 ∈ s2 ∧(c1[|`t]s2)[~ =](TopOpen `(EEhil ` c0))))))), (c1 ∈ 2ndc ∧ c1 ∈ Haus ∧ c1 ∈ Locally([(TopOpen `(EEhil ` c0))]~ =)))
  ismntoplly(c0, c1, c2)
